name: 1 Finance
description: At 1 Finance, we are reimagining the landscape of personal finance advisory in India. We are dedicated to delivering holistic financial planning tailored to your individual needs and life aspirations. It's this distinctive approach that sets us apart. Embark on this transformative journey - a holistic financial planning approach that covers all aspects of your personal finances. This includes planning of investments, liabilities, insurance, tax, cash flow, will, and retirement. Through the expertise of our qualified financial advisors, we guide you towards tranquillity by offering hyper-personalised and unbiased advice, empowering you to attain a state of financial well-being. Financial well-being can be defined as a state of being wherein a person can fully meet current and ongoing financial obligations, can feel secure in their financial future, and is able to make choices that allow enjoyment of life. It's not just about creation of wealth, but also about nurturing your mental and emotional well-being.
features: Where a client doesn’t feel that they are or will ever be cheated or misguided because the advisor is chasing targets.
Where employees don’t have a constant anxiety to prove themselves and feel under threat of being disposed off at the whims and fancies of management.
Where partners do not have to keep negotiating before rendering every service, and believe that if an institution grows, they will too.
Headline: Get a holistic & personalised Financial Wellness Plan.
ShortDescription: At 1 Finance, we are reimagining the landscape of personal finance advisory in India. We are dedicated to delivering holistic financial planning tailored to your individual needs and life aspirations. It's this distinctive approach that sets us apart.
enhanced_description: 1 Finance offers hyper-personalized and unbiased personal financial planning advisory services, specifically tailored for individuals in India. The service aims to deliver holistic financial planning covering crucial aspects such as investments, liabilities, insurance, tax planning, cash flow management, will preparation, and retirement planning. By empowering individuals to achieve financial well-being – defined as the ability to meet financial obligations, feel secure about the financial future, and make choices for life enjoyment – 1 Finance also nurtures mental and emotional well-being. This service is positioned to be integrated into corporate employee benefits programs, supporting an organization's objectives to improve employee happiness and engagement through comprehensive financial wellness initiatives.
key_use_cases: Providing personalized financial advisory as an employee benefit
Offering tax planning guidance as part of employee benefits
Enhancing overall employee well-being through financial security
competitive_advantages: Holistic financial planning approach covering all personal finance aspects
Focus on both financial and mental/emotional well-being
Assurance to clients that advice is not driven by advisor commission targets
roi_benefits: Support for employee mental and emotional well-being
primary_users: Employees (as beneficiaries of financial advisory services)
Individuals (as direct clients of the advisory service)
